name: Cold Pages
description:
This game was made in 50 hours as part of the Pencil, Chisel, Code! game jam!

You play as a librarian who needs to burn his beloved books to stay warm, but burning the books without reading them (in order!) makes him go insane. Survive the winter & try to stay sane while sacrificing your life's work - one small book at a time...

Controls

MoveWASDPick up & Hold BooksLMB | RMB
Interact (Read/Burn)EJumpSpaceExit GameAlt + F4 (sorry)

Credits

Adriaan Koorevaar - Programming, Design and Systems

Yuli Ognyanov - Design, Systems, 2D-Art and Programming

Kristjan Kull - Design, Systems, Audio and Programming

Sylvius von Aulock - Level Design, Environment Art, Character Art

Veronica Redlaff - 3D-Art, Textures, Rigging, Animation, VFX

Ketlin Riks - Prop & Environment Art
